title: game crashes after 20 seconds
body: game crashes after entering the game usually about 20 seconds in. i have to hit reconnect exit then reconnect again for it to work. my computer is pretty good so dont believe it to be the issue.

replies.body:
I've been seeing this reported quite a bit recently. It looks like this could be happening due to the Xbox game bar or the SmartScreen security filter in League. You can find instructions on disabling these features [here](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) and [here](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/930168). Additionally, if you run League in compatibility mode, it could be causing this as well, so you'll want to [ensure compatibility mode is turned off.](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/15078/windows-make-older-programs-compatible)

Let me know if the issue persists through those checks or changes.
